header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Grandparents, cousins, relations living in Galway, dancing, arrangements, looking at the ‘birdies’.
header.activity: Relationships and grandparents conversation with mother and daughter.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
